title: Getting Started
description: Learn the basics of the NovelMind Editor interface and workflow

steps.title: Welcome to NovelMind
steps.content: This quick tour will introduce you to the key areas of the editor. You can exit at any time by pressing Escape or clicking the X button.
steps.details: NovelMind is a visual novel engine designed for professional narrative development.

steps.title: Scene View
steps.content: The Scene View shows your visual novel scenes in WYSIWYG mode. Here you can position characters, backgrounds, and UI elements.

steps.title: Story Graph
steps.content: The Story Graph is where you build your narrative flow. Create dialogue nodes, choices, and branching paths using a visual node-based editor.

steps.title: Hierarchy Panel
steps.content: The Hierarchy shows all objects in your current scene. Select objects here to edit their properties.

steps.title: Inspector Panel
steps.content: When you select an object, its properties appear in the Inspector. Modify text, positions, animations, and more.

steps.title: Asset Browser
steps.content: Your project assets (images, audio, scripts) are organized here. Drag assets into scenes or reference them in your story.

steps.title: Ready to Create
steps.content: That covers the basics. Explore the Help menu for more tutorials on specific features like voice recording, localization, and animation.
